name: rotate
title: Rotate
description:
Return a Transform which represents composed clockwise
   rotations along each of the axes. Equivalent to the result of
   Matrix.multiply(rotateX(phi), rotateY(theta), rotateZ(psi)).

phi.title: Phi
phi.description: radians to rotate about the positive x axis

theta.title: Theta
theta.description: radians to rotate about the positive y axis

psi.title: Psi
psi.description: radians to rotate about the positive z axis
